example.name: all arguments
example.text: In the year since the pill went on the French market , the National Organization for Women and its offshoot , former NOW President Eleanor Smeal 's Fund for a Feminist Majority , have been trying [*-1] to browbeat the U.S. pharmaceutical industry into [*-2] getting involved .
